input.description: Echo the value of CLAUDE_CODE environment variable

content.text: The `$CLAUDE_CODE` environment variable is not set or is empty.

input.description: Echo the value of AI_ASSISTANT environment variable

content.text: The `$AI_ASSISTANT` environment variable is not set or is empty.

content.text:
Here are the environment variables. I can see several relevant ones:

- `CLAUDECODE=1` - indicates Claude Code is running
- `CLAUDE_CODE_ENTRYPOINT=cli` - shows the entry point is CLI
- `JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-21-openjdk-amd64`
- `MAVEN_HOME=/opt/apache-maven-3.9.10`
